thread.title: Brave, sensual subway rider reads erotic fiction in huge font
thread.title_full: Brave, sensual subway rider reads erotic fiction in huge font

author: Tyler Schmall
title: Brave, sensual subway rider reads erotic fiction in huge font
text:
Living in New York City means taking the subway a lot. And taking the subway a lot means having time to kill. Some use that time to listen to music or play sudoku.
Others however, prefer to read erotic fiction in huge, unmissable print, which is what Twitter user @amateurdentist found out today.
SEE ALSO: 17 all-too-real terms that describe riding the subway
woman next to me on subway reading an erotic novel in 128 pt font pic.twitter.com/uMGpsay0xj
â€” amateurdentist (@amateurdentist) January 6, 2017
How you spend your time on your commute is yours and we can think of no better place to get hot and steamy than a rush hour subway car packed to the brim with strangers.
Godspeed to this human.
BONUS: 1 laptop, 3 4K screens, the ultimate gaming experience
